name: key_statistics
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yahoo_finance.
Tool description: Access Yahoo Finance Realtime Stock Price |  Options | ESG | Trends | Statistics | Earnings | Balance Sheets | Analytics | Asset Profile and much more
API description: The key statistics endpoint provides a summary of key financial statistics for a company. The endpoint returns the following data: market capitalization, enterprise value, trailing P/E ratio, forward P/E ratio, PEG ratio, price/sales (ttm), price/book (mrq), enterprise value/revenue (ttm), enterprise value/EBITDA (ttm)

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol to retrieve key statistics for.
